name: CHEEKY ELF Christmas Soft Toy Doll PDF Sewing Pattern - photo tutorial - e-file
description:
This listing is to purchase the 22 page Sewing Pattern & Tutorial to make the dolls yourself, this is not a finished product.  This sewing pattern will be emailed as a PDF to the email address provided with the Paypal payment. If you would like it emailed to an alternative email address please include a message with your payment.  Emails are usually sent within 24 hours of payment.  If you have not received your pattern after 24 hours please email me at littlesewandsews@hotmail.com so I can sort it out :)

EXPERIENCE LEVEL:  Beginner friendly (but not for those completely new to sewing) - no experience with Soft toy sewing is necessary as a step-by-step photo tutorial is included.  If at any time you need help please email me :)

name: PDF Sewing Pattern Lachie Lion Plush - photo tutorial - e-file - proceeds to SMA Australia
description:
** Proceeds from this sewing pattern are donated to the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Association of Australia in honour of baby Lachlan Brown who passed away in 2013 aged 3 months.  For more information about this genetic condition please head to http://www.smaaustralia.org.au/**

This listing is to purchase the 14 page Sewing Pattern & Tutorial to make the softies yourself, this is not a finished product. name: PDF Pattern Softie Tool Set includes photo tutorial - electronic file
description:
**This is for the Sewing pattern only - not the finished product**

Make your own 3 Piece Softie Tool set with this original Little Sew & Sews pattern complete with 8 pages of full sized pattern pieces, photo tutorial and handy tips - great for a beginner level sewer! Finished tools will measure between 22-27cms but the pattern can be enlarged or reduced to change the size! Or even use the pattern templates as applique's!

Materials and equipment required:
Pre-washed & ironed fabric (approx. 60cm x 40cm) Directional prints may require more - any non stretch fabric is suitable
Thread to match main fabric colour
Good quality washable toy filling
Rattle insert (optional)
Sewing machine
Scissors and/or pinking shears
Washable or air erasable marker pen
Turning/Stuffing tools
Needle & pins

All pattern purchases will be emailed within 24 hours to the email address used for payment.  If you want it emailed to a different email address, please make sure you let me know in a separate email after payment - littlesewandsews@hotmail.com . If you pattern has not arrived to the Paypal email address or your supplied email address within 48 hours please double check your junk folder and then email me 

This is a PDF file in English, you will need Adobe to be able to open & print the pattern pieces

YES you can sell products made from Little Sew & Sews patterns, please credit Little Sew & Sews on swing tags or in descriptions for on-line listings.  Please refer to the pattern information pages for more details regarding conditions of selling.

RRP: $7 per pattern

If you have any questions or feedback regarding the pattern, please email me at littlesewandsews@hotmail.com
Last pattern update: June , 2013

Please do not use any Little Sew & Sews sewing patterns to replicate the intellectual property and designs of others, this includes, but is not limited to licensed characters (for e.g. Batman, Superman etc).  By purchasing this pattern you agree that Little Sew & Sews can not be held liable for any legal proceedings taken out against you or for any claims for compensation of financial loss/royalties due to your actions involving Little Sew & Sews sewing patterns.

name: PDF Sewing Pattern Toddler Softie Handsaw includes photo tutorial - electronic file
description:
**This is for the Sewing pattern only - not the finished product**

Make your own Toddler Softie Handsaw with this original Little Sew & Sews pattern complete with 9 pages of full sized pattern pieces, photo tutorial and handy tips - great for a beginner level sewer! Finished handsaw measures approximately 31cm long but the pattern can be enlarged or reduced to change the size! 

Materials and equipment required:
Pre-washed & ironed main fabric (approx. 26cm x 26cm) Directional prints may require more
Heavy iron-on interfacing -  12cm x 25cm
Wadding/batting - 12cm x 25cm 
Felt - 20cmx16cm
Thread to match main fabric colour
Good quality toy filling (small amount for handle)
Jumbo (approx. 2.1cm wide ) Ric Rac - 26cm  ( you could use smaller width Ric Rac as well - I just love the jumbo size!)
Sewing machine
Scissors 
Marker/Chalk/Pencil
Turning/Stuffing tools
Pins

All pattern purchases will be emailed within 24 hours to the email address used for payment.  If you want it emailed to a different email address, please make sure you let me know in a message with your payment.
